message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split. Let's meet in the middle.
Let's compromise. I'll take 70% and you get 30%. It's closer to your proposal, and we can avoid more rounds.
I'm getting closer to your offer. I'll give you 45% and take 55%. It's still a good compromise, and we can finalize the deal.
I'm willing to come down to 55% to meet you halfway. Let's end this negotiation now.
